= Installation Overview =

  # Install Bloom
  # Add `bloom.track` to `INSTALLED_APPS

  # Add `bloom.track.decorators.track` to a view

= Installation Guide =

=== 1. Install Bloom ===

=== 2. Add `bloom.track` to `INSTALLED_APPS ===

{{{
INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'bloom.track',
    ...
)
}}}

=== 3. Add `bloom.track.middleware.TrackMiddleware` to your `MIDDLEWARE_CLASSES` ===

Adding the `TrackMiddleware` will record user history on all views, including admin views.

{{{
MIDDLEWARE_CLASSES = (
    ...
    'bloom.track.middleware.TrackMiddleware',
    ...
)
}}}

=== 4. Add `bloom.track.decorators.track` to a view ===

Use the `Add `bloom.track.decorators.track` decorator to record analytics about a single view.

{{{
from bloom.track.decorators import track

@track
def my_view(request):
    ...
}}}
